summary: Makes Archmages Robes worthy for a master of the mystic arts.
descriptionHtml:
I finally become archmage & recieve new robes with the job. But why are the robes weaker then expert mage robes. This mod fixes that & makes the Archmages Robes worthy for a master of the mystic arts.

---DESCRIPTION---
This mod improves the enchantments of the Archmages Robes to be slightly better then master mage robes. This also adds the missing +50 magicka enchantment to the hoodless version.

Vanilla - All spells cost 15% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 100% faster.
Master Robes -  Single school of spells cost 22% less to cast, and magicka regenerates 150% faster.

Main - All spells cost 25% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 175% faster.
Light - All spells cost 22% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 125% faster.
Medium - All spells cost 25% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 150% faster.
Medium2- All spells cost 25% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 125% faster.

---INSTALL---
Use mod manger or place contents into Data directory.

---UNISTALL---
Remove files from Data directory.

---UPDATE---
* Uploaded version with requested enchantment magnitudes
         - All spells cost 22% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 125% faster.
* Uploaded version with requested enchantment magnitudes
         - All spells cost 25% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 150% faster.
* Uploaded version with requested enchantment magnitudes
         - All spells cost 25% less to cast, +50 magicka, and magicka regenerates 125% faster.
* Fixed error that causes NPC\'s to comment that you have no clothes on. MEDIUM VERSIONS ONLY
* Fixed enchanments for medium versions.
author: Savage Hammer
